content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Miss Müller. As you know, I am not interested in discussing anything other than the rental price. So, how much are you willing to pay for this apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am a student, and I am looking for a place that is both affordable and convenient. This apartment seems to fit my needs, as it is newly built and in the city center. I am prepared to pay a fair price. How much are you asking for the apartment?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Fair price, huh? Well, I am looking for the highest price possible. I think 2500 euros per month would be a good start.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your time, but I am not willing to pay 2500 euros per month. I am on a student budget, and that price is outside of my range. Is there any room for negotiation?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Of course, there is room for negotiation. I am always ready to haggle. So, how much are you willing to pay, Miss Müller?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am prepared to pay 1800 euros per month for the apartment. I believe this is a fair offer, considering the size and location of the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 1800 euros is significantly lower than what I am looking for. I will meet you halfway. How about 2100 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, 2100 euros per month is still higher than what I can afford. I would like to propose 1900 euros per month. This would be my absolute highest offer.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I see. 1900 euros per month is still lower than what I am looking for. However, I can accept your offer. I agree to the price of 1900 euros per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Wonderful news, Mister Schmidt! I am very pleased to hear that we have reached an agreement. I agree to the price of 1900 euros per month! TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
